Package net.ssehub.comani.utility

Class InfrastructureUtilities

java.lang.Object
net.ssehub.comani.utility.InfrastructureUtilities
public class InfrastructureUtilities
extends java.lang.Object
This class provides utility methods for the main infrastructure, like updating the classpath.
Author:
Christian Kroeher

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static InfrastructureUtilities getInstance()
    Returns the single instance of the InfrastructureUtilities.
    AbstractCommitAnalyzer instantiateAnalyzer​(java.lang.String analyzerMainClassName, java.util.Properties analysisProperties, IAnalysisQueue analysisQueue)
    Instantiates the desired commit analyzer defined by the given analyzer main class name by using the given analysis properties and queue.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static InfrastructureUtilities getInstance()
      Returns the single instance of the InfrastructureUtilities.
      Returns:
      the single instance of the InfrastructureUtilities

    • setPluginsDirectory

      public void setPluginsDirectory​(java.io.File directory)
      Adds the given directory as the plug-ins directory in which extractors and analyzers are located. This directory is defined at runtime based on the core.plugins_dir property value defined by the user in the configuration file.
      Parameters:
      directory - the ComAnI plug-ins directory as defined by the value of the core.plugins_dir property; should never be null

    • instantiateAnalyzer

      public AbstractCommitAnalyzer instantiateAnalyzer​(java.lang.String analyzerMainClassName, java.util.Properties analysisProperties, IAnalysisQueue analysisQueue)
      Instantiates the desired commit analyzer defined by the given analyzer main class name by using the given analysis properties and queue.
      Parameters:
      analyzerMainClassName - the fully qualified main class name of the analyzer to instantiate
      analysisProperties - the analysis Properties defined by the user in the configuration file
      analysisQueue - the IAnalysisQueue to be used by the analyzer
      Returns:
      an instance of AbstractCommitAnalyzer or null, if instantiating the desired analyzer failed

    • instantiateExtractor

      public AbstractCommitExtractor instantiateExtractor​(java.lang.String extractorMainClassName, java.util.Properties extractionProperties, IExtractionQueue extractionQueue)
      Instantiates the desired commit extractor defined by the given extractor main class name by using the given extraction properties and queue.
      Parameters:
      extractorMainClassName - the fully qualified main class name of the extractor to instantiate
      extractionProperties - the extraction Properties defined by the user in the configuration file
      extractionQueue - the IExtractionQueue to be used by the extractor
      Returns:
      an instance of AbstractCommitExtractor or null, if instantiating the desired extractor failed
